OOC: is the Chivitron base in plain sight?

::Axis(as large hover jet)::

Axis fires up his boosters, "A'right people, lets rock and roll." With 
that, he rips off down the mountain towards the target location. 
With jet thrusters roaring, he comes over a hill to see a base with 
several bots outside it. He stops about 35 feet away from them, 
and the transformation breaks up into Axis, Seekker, and Lokk. 
Axis and Lokk land on the ground, weapons drawn. Axis says to 
the bots outside "Our short range scanner found large traces of 
energon, signs of battle, what is happening here?" Lokk lands 
beside him, and loads his machine guns as he looks around for 
any signs of hostiles.


On 24 Apr 2001, at 23:01, gunthers8@... wrote:

> > a possible base and fight happening." Axis transforms into his half
